content:
Hi all
I have ubuntu 18.04 and zulip 4.11 and want to upgrade my server for 20.04 and zulip 5.0
I saw your tutorial about that
So I have a question
/home/zulip/deployments/current/manage.py backup --output=/home/zulip/release-upgrade.backup.tar.gz these steps are necessary?
Taking a backup is not strictly necessary, but strongly encouraged.
@Pavel Yashchuk: I'm curious if you can tell us a little about why you're hesitant do to that step?

@Alex Vandiver it is a simple ) not enough disk space on the server) I will think what to delete)
Thanks
